titleStmt.title: The lawfulnes of obeying the present government and acting under it with some other additions to a former edition / by one that loves all presbyterian lovers of truth and peace and is of their communion.
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to Francis Rous.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
